events_categories.title: Events in Mumbai
events_categories.description: Mumbai is the most populous city of the state and, it is the land where dreams come true. Starting from Bollywood to trade, Mumbai is flourishing from all nooks and corners. People from various parts of the country, take up residence in Mumbai for their future and thus, you can find a diverse culture here. This caused Mumbai to be the hub for numerous cultural activities, events and festivals.

events_categories.title: Events in Delhi
events_categories.description: Delhi celebrates many festivals and organizes several events and fairs. Despite the seasonal changes, the capital city remains busy, lively and colorful with the happenings held in the city. The city offers so much to its visitors and locals according to the season, culture and religion. Delhi is known for organizing various international festivals and fairs to promote tourism, which attracts a large number of tourists every year.

events_categories.title: Events in Bangalore
events_categories.description: Enjoying the oh-so-pleasant Bangalore weather is easy to do, with the city hosting a bunch of events ever so often. There is always something fun happening in and around town for you to check out, whether you enjoy shopping, learning something new, or live shows. Here are the top events that you can attend in April in Bangalore. Some of these are quickly filling up as we type, so whether it's early bird passes or final phase tickets, grab them now!

events_categories.title: Events in Chandigarh
events_categories.description: Chandigarh is a beautiful city in northern India that is renowned for its modern architecture, lush gardens, and rich cultural heritage. The city boasts a vibrant events calendar, with numerous festivals and events taking place throughout the year. These events celebrate the region's art, culture, food, music, and traditions, and offer visitors a unique opportunity to experience the local way of life.

events_categories.title: Events in Patna
events_categories.description: Patna is the capital city of Bihar, one of the oldest and most culturally rich states in India. The city has a deep history that spans over thousands of years and is known for its rich heritage, art, and culture. Patna hosts several events throughout the year, which celebrate the city's unique identity and bring people from different parts of the country and the world together. These events are a testament to the city's cultural diversity, and each one offers visitors a unique insight into the local way of life.

allEvents.title: Sunburn Arena Ft. Boris Brejcha - Mumbai
allEvents.description: Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to get your dancing shoes on as we welcome you to an unforgettable night of music and entertainment. We are thrilled to present Sunburn Arena featuring the one and only Boris Brejcha, the German DJ and producer known for his unique style of high-tech

allEvents.title: Sonu Nigam Live In Concert - Mumbai
allEvents.description: Sonu Nigam is performing live again in Mumbai on public demand. Sonu Nigam is a playback singer, music composer and actor who primarily works in Hindi and Kannada film industries.

allEvents.title: Kumar Sanu - LIVE IN CONCERT
allEvents.description: Kumar Sanu is a well-known Indian playback singer also known as the King of Melody in Bollywood. He has sung more than 20 thousand songs in Hindi; Bengali; Marathi and many more languages.He is also the winner of the Guinness Book of World Records 1993. He was awarded Padma Shri by the Government of India.

allEvents.title: DJ Chetas Live at Xoyo Thane
allEvents.description: Thane, Get ready for a Biggest Club Event with Bollywood No. 1 DJ, DJ Chetas.|No 1 Bollywood Dj Performing| Best Bollywood Party

allEvents.title: Samay Raina Unfiltered - India Tour
allEvents.description: Samay Raina as always, brings an unfiltered version of himself on this tour. Bringing lots of new jokes in this tour and jokes from the last tour with a new flavour.

allEvents.title: The Half Fried Show by Aakash Gupta
allEvents.description: Aakash Gupta is building his new show after 3 years. He has a lot of raw jokes, new stories and even more weirder observations than before. It`s so much new material that he doesn`t remember it all. So come for an evening full of laughs & watch him perform live with his notebook on stage

allEvents.title: So Rude of Me - By Swati Sachdeva
allEvents.description: Swati Sachdeva brings to you her best one hour (and a bit more) of her best jokes, only at Comedy County. Book your tickets now!

allEvents.title: Basti Ka Hasti - MC- Stan India Tour 23 - Delhi
allEvents.description: Basti Ka Hasti fame, After winning the Big Boss 2023, MC Stan is coming to your city! He will be performing across 10 cities just for his fans! Come watch him live!

allEvents.title: Jo Bolta Hai Wohi Hota Hai feat Harsh Gujral
allEvents.description: It takes exemplary courage to sit in the first two rows of a Harsh Gujral`s show because he will get you with his highly witty yet charming style.

allEvents.title: Chess Connect / Bangalore Chess Club
allEvents.description: Are you tired of playing chess online and looking for a way to play friendly games in person over-the-board? We have you covered. Bangalore Chess Club is here with another Chess Connect. Do you need to be a professional? NO. We have players from all age and rating categories!

allEvents.title: Raftaar Intensity Tour - Bangalore
allEvents.description: Bangalore! Rap sensation, Raftaar is all set to arrive in your city with his most anticipated ‘Intensity India Tour’ on 27th May 2023.You don’t want to miss out on this one! Tickets are now available!

allEvents.title: Badass Bollywood Night
allEvents.description: The very popular Friday party is back to to its predominant venue, its party hot-spot Vapour Indiranagar. We know you love the venue especially when your favourite DJ Hassan takes over the decks every Friday.
allEvents.place: Vapour Pub And Brewery, Indiranagar: Bangalore

allEvents.title: NOT JUST HARYANVI Ft. VIJAY YADAV
allEvents.description: Yadav is effortless with his jokes. If you dig Hindi comedy then he can prove to be a refreshing entry to your watchlist. His jokes mainly surround Haryana, Haryanvis, his friends, and family.And don`t worry, he has promised not to threaten anyone this time.

allEvents.title: AVVY SRA
allEvents.description: avvy sra performing live on 13th may saturday night Come and enjoy your saturday night with punjabi star with punjabi hits

allEvents.title: Raftaar Live in Chandigarh (Intensity Tour)
allEvents.description: Make some noise Chandigarh! Raftaar is bringing his much awaited Intensity India Tour to your city on 20th May 2023.

allEvents.title: Gaurav Kapoor Live
allEvents.description: Gaurav Kapoor, the funny one from Delhi is back in action with his first ever online comedy show.Gaurav is a regular featured act at comedy clubs across the country and has performed on the biggest of stages including opening for Vir Das and Russell Brand on his India tour.

allEvents.title: Bigad Gaye The by Rajat Sood
allEvents.description: Bigad Gaye The is a show where Rajat Sood talks about major reason of getting spoiled: his love life. He is best known for his comical take on romance which will make you fall in love with the show, or maybe with him. So come to the show with all the love you have in your heart and enjoy!

allEvents.title: The Comedy Theatre
allEvents.description: The comedy theatre  is the best comedy club in town where in we get you the most seasoned comedians from all around the globe all under one roof. It is better known as home for comics.

allEvents.title: Mithila Art Workshop
allEvents.description: Mithila Painting or the Madhubani Painting is an art form that originated from Bihar. These paintings are done using fingers, twigs, matchsticks, natural dyes, and pigments and have complex geometric shapes. If you wish not to get all messy, then don’t worry as you can stick to regular brushes and pens.

allEvents.title: Laser Show At Mangal Talab
allEvents.description: Enjoy a thrilling laser show right in the heart of Patna at Mangal Talab. Nothing about it resembles the typical laser show we watch. On the side of a natural lake, which you may see glistering in the nights as the lights from around fall on its water, at a location that is removed from the cacophony of buildings and vehicles.
